snippet: As Lenovo diversifies into smartphones and tablets, it said its net income rose 30 percent, to $265 million, and revenue increased 15 percent.
abstract: Lenovo reports quarterly net income of $265 million for period ending Dec 31, 2013, up 30 percent from year-ago period; reports 15 percent increase in revenue, to $10.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: As Lenovo diversifies into smartphones and tablets, it said its net income rose 30 percent, to $265 million, and revenue increased 15 percent.

headline.main: Lenovo Reports Income Increase as It Expands
headline.print_headline: Lenovo Making Gains in Moving Beyond the PC
